title: League of Legends lagging on new computer (16 Gb ram)
body:
So I bought a new computer its an HP Envy. It lags a lot while playing League of legends and I'm not sure why. My older computer had 8gb of ram and this one has 16 and a better processor so I'm confused as to why it lags. Here are the specs 
Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6500U CPU @2.50 Ghz 2.60 GHz
Ram: 16.0 GB
System Type: 64-Bit Operating system, x64-based processor
Pen and Touch: Touch Support with 10 Touch Points

replies.body:
Hey there,

RAM doesn't affect your performance in league, your processor may however, especially if you do not have a dedicated GPU in the system.

Did your old computer have a dedicated graphics card? Or were you using the systems onboard graphics?

Does your current computer come with dedicated graphics? Could you provide the model number of the system so I can look to see if it meets the minimum specifications to run league?

Product name: HP envy m7 notebook
Product Number: M1W11UA#ABA

That laptop comes with a Nvidia Geforce 940M card built in, you should have no issues running league on that machine.

Are your graphics drivers up to date?
http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx
Yeah that's why I'm confused as to why it's lagging :/ My drivers are all up to date everything is. I guess it's just my internet connection right?
